QuestData.Title: Certified Pre-Owned
QuestData.Description:
First, let me say that you will ALWAYS be our favorite test subject.
But our experiments require far more sacrifice than a single test subject can offer. And, from time to time, some of those test subjects require new limbs.
My dear brother and I have a nascent concept for expanding the average lifespan of mechanical appendages. But we've run out of components to experiment on.
Salvage some appendages from the heap outside town so we can continue our experiments.
